LegacyEmbed.Presentation.create.value: Create an embed for this agenda

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.embedPresentati.value: The public embed code allows you to simply embed a complete agenda or a selection of events into a web page. Find it on the export modal of your agenda homepage.

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.legacyEmbedPres.value: Create an embed code to be used right away

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.legacyEmbedSumm.value: Use an embed code right away

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.legacyEmbedWarn.value: A redesign of this feature is under process; use as much as possible for a new integration the Customizable embed code method

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.pluginsPresenta.value: Use the plugin corresponding to your CMS, allowing for a flexible and advanced integration of your events: adapt the layout and the styles, chose the filters to use...

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.pluginsSummary.value: Your website is powered by Wordpress, Drupal or Typo3

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.portalPresentat.value: Deploy a dedicated bespoke events portal on your domain. This can be done by your web agency or by the OpenAgenda web development team.

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.portalSummary.value: You want a dedicated website to display your events

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.standardEmbedGe.value: We'll get back to you shortly with a ready to use embed code

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.standardEmbedPr.value: Ottenete un codice embed da inserire in una pagina del vostro sito web. Verranno visualizzati gli eventi e le funzioni di ricerca e filtraggio di vostra scelta. È possibile apportare alcune modifiche visive. La configurazione e l'utilizzo di questo codice sono gratuiti.

LegacyEmbed.Presentation.standardEmbedSu.value: You want a simple and efficient embed code to place in your website
